circumstances: During initial approach to DuPage Airport while on flight from Sioux Center, Iowa, the twin engine airplane stalled and crashed in St Charles, few miles from the airfield. The pilot and a passenger were killed while three other passengers were seriously injured.
probable_cause:
Stall during initial approach after the pilot failed to maintain flying speed. The following contributing factors were reported: 
- The pilot failed to follow approved procedures, 
- Propeller controls not advanced.
